Class XMLIndexer

java.lang.Object
com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.XMLIndexer

Runnable
public class XMLIndexer extends Object implements Runnable
A worker for parallel lucene indexing.

  • Constructor Details

    • XMLIndexer

      public XMLIndexer(org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriter writer, String preXsl) throws FileNotFoundException, TransformerException
      Create a thread reading a shared file list to index. Provide an indexWriter, a file list iterator, and an optional compiled xsl.
      Parameters:
      writer - lucene index writer.
      preXsl - optional XSL file to transfom XML source before indexation.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - pre transformation XSLfile not found.
      TransformerException - XSLT error.

    • index

      public static void index(org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriter writer, List<Path> files, String prexsl) throws TransformerException, InterruptedException, ParserConfigurationException, SAXException, IOException
      Indexation of a list of XML file in a lucene index.
      Parameters:
      writer - destination lucene writer.
      files - list of files to index.
      prexsl - optional file path of an xsl transformation to apply before indexation.
      Throws:
      TransformerException - xsl errors.
      InterruptedException - multi-threading error.
      IOException - lucene write error.
      SAXException - alix namespace error.
      ParserConfigurationException - XML error.
